info.title: Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup
info.author: Ported by PaceMaker
info.details:
Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup is a fun, free rogue-like game of exploration and treasure-hunting in dungeons filled with dangerous and unfriendly monsters in a quest for the mystifyingly fabulous Orb of Zot.  For more information see: crawl-ref.sourceforge.net
Version:
	0.4.5 - Wii Release 1 (alpha)
Controls:
   Point at screen:
	Point at screen to activate On Screen Keyboard (OSK).
	(A) - Select OSK Key

   Hold sideways:
	D Pad - Move character up/down/left/right.
	D Pad + (2) - Run character up/down/left/right.
	(A) - Repeat last command (if applicable)
	(B) - Space Bar (clears --more--)
	(-) - Opens/Closes Context Menu.
	(+) - Opens/Closes Rare Commands Menu.
	(1) - Opens/Closes Common Commands Menu.

   Hold sideways in Menu
	D Pad - Move menu up/down
	2 - Select menu item.
